TopicTitle: I need help with my jet

Articles.Content:
Apparently after I hold the A key my jet stalls 100%.

I tried changing where my rudder at but still nothing changed.

I disabled yaw in everything but it still stalls! Help me
Gameplay question moved to Gameplay Questions.

@corporelax: If you could do me a favor - please post a couple of images of the craft in the SPH. Within those pictures, have the center of lift, the center of mass, and the center of thrust indicators, I will be able to help. I've gotten pretty good with aircraft.
Not sure why you would think disabling yaw on everything would help you with a stalling problem.  As adsii1970 said, a picture of your craft would help enormously with trying to diagnose the problem.
Are you entering a flat spin, or just tumbling out of the air?

…why are you trying to turn with your rudder?! You want to turn by applying roll.*

In theory many planes can be flown without considering the rudder at all. It's just uncomfortable as hell. And not very safe.

* this is, admittedly, super non-intuitive

Edited August 24, 2016 by pincushionman
Are you using FAR or stock aerodynamics?
